item.lotmcraft.ally_ability.description: Designate an entity as your ally
item.lotmcraft.holy_song_ability.descrip: Play a holy tune to buff yourself
item.lotmcraft.fire_of_light_ability.des: Use Holy Fire to smite your foes
item.lotmcraft.holy_light_summoning_abil: Summon a Holy Light from the sky
item.lotmcraft.cleave_of_purification_ab: A holy strike in front of you
item.lotmcraft.notary_buff_ability.descr: Amplify your attacks by calling upon your god
item.lotmcraft.notary_debuff_ability.des: Weaken your enemies by calling upon your god
item.lotmcraft.light_of_holiness_ability: Summon blazing a hot pillar of light from the sky
item.lotmcraft.purification_halo_ability: Produce a halo, that purifies everything
Condense a Spear made of pure Sunlight
item.lotmcraft.unshadowed_domain_ability: Illuminate every corner of a region, and purify all entities in range
item.lotmcraft.flaring_sun_ability.descr: Summon a huge ball of pure Light condensed by sacred flame
item.lotmcraft.wall_of_light_ability.des: Summon a Wall made of Light, that will not let enemies through it
A Sword made of Light will strike enemies from above
item.lotmcraft.spear_of_light_ability.de: A Spear made of Pure White Light will be summoned, enemies hit by it won't be able to flee
item.lotmcraft.solar_envoy_ability.descr: Transform Yourself into a miniature Sun, setting ablaze everything in range
item.lotmcraft.wings_of_light_ability.de: Summon a pair of Wings, that let you fly
Under the pure White Light, everything will be disintegrated
item.lotmcraft.divine_kingdom_manifestat: Manifest an embryonic Divine Kingdom to immediately scorch all non beyonders and weaken other Beyonders to the point of helplessness
item.lotmcraft.pyrokinesis_ability.descr: Control flames, throwing fireballs, making walls made of fire, summoning fire ravens, condensing spears made of fire and let fire engulf everything in area
item.lotmcraft.cull_ability.description: Discover your enemies and their weaknesses, to increase your damage against them
item.lotmcraft.flame_mastery_ability.des: Stronger version of Pyrokinesis. You can now throw multiple fireballs into enemies, erupt a massive explosion made of fire or transform into flame, soaring in the skies
item.lotmcraft.steel_mastery_ability.des: Transform your body into steel to negate the damage, or transform your flame into steel to bind your enemies with it
Make Entities your subordinates. They will fight for you and you can spread your damage among them.
ability.lotmcraft.chain_of_command.no_co: The entity did not want to become your subordinate
item.lotmcraft.fog_of_war_ability.descri: Create a dense fog to hinder your enemies and advantage yourself
item.lotmcraft.war_cry_ability.descripti: A deafening cry that damages your enemies and boosts your abilities
item.lotmcraft.war_song_ability.descript: Buff your strength and speed with a song
item.lotmcraft.essence_of_war_ability.de: Summons a banner that debuffs enemies heavily and buffs you in a certain area
item.lotmcraft.flight_ability.descriptio: Fly like a butterfly, sting like a wasp
item.lotmcraft.weather_manipulation_abil: Change the weather, causing snow storms, drought and tornados
item.lotmcraft.conquering_ability.descri: Conquer all entities around you. If their Sequence is lower they will be rendered completely helpless and if not they will still struggle to resist
item.lotmcraft.flame_authority_ability.d: Manipulate purple flame, throwing spears of destruction, summoning an inferno, that turns everything inside to a dust and flame vortex, burning every living creature around you to a crisp
item.lotmcraft.puppet_soldier_creation_a: Create 5 Puppet Soldiers, each equal to Sequence 4 Red Priest Demigod and command them
item.lotmcraft.raging_blows_ability.desc: A series of powerful blows that damage your opp
item.lotmcraft.water_manipulation_abilit: The ability to manipulate water to damage your opponent
item.lotmcraft.wind_manipulation_ability: The ability to manipulate wind to damage your opponent
item.lotmcraft.lightning_ability.descrip: Summon lightnings to strike your opponent
item.lotmcraft.siren_song_ability.descri: A song that affect your opponent in various ways
item.lotmcraft.tsunami_ability.descripti: Summon a tsunami to wash your opponent
item.lotmcraft.earthquake_ability.descri: Cause a tremblor through the earth damage your opponent
item.lotmcraft.hurricane_ability.descrip: Summon a hurricane to rip through your opponent
item.lotmcraft.roar_ability.description: A deafening cry that damages your enemies
Shoot out a lightning that spread out to form a
item.lotmcraft.torrential_downpour_abili: Bring fouth a strong rainfall that deals damage the opponent
item.lotmcraft.lightning_storm_ability.d: Summon a lightning storm that rains down a group of lightning, destroying your opponent
item.lotmcraft.calamity_creation_ability: Summon a calamity creation to befall the area you stand
item.lotmcraft.energy_transformation_abi: Transform your body into pure energy
item.lotmcraft.heavenly_punishment_abili: Call in a divine lightning to strike down your opponent
item.lotmcraft.roar_of_the_thunder_god_a: The cry of a god that destroy your enemies
item.lotmcraft.poisonous_flame_ability.d: Flame that poisons and burns your enemy
item.lotmcraft.flame_spells_ability.desc: Manipulate with flame to either shoot fireballs or make it explode around you
item.lotmcraft.language_of_foulness_abil: Language of devils, it has several uses, like slowing your target, corrupting them or deal massive damage with Death
Transform into illusionary, thick, black liquid that is a collection of emothions and desires. Anyone you touch will get corrupted, but if you stumble upon someone who is stronger than you, you will lose control
item.lotmcraft.defiling_seed_ability.des: Bury your seed into target to corrupt them
item.lotmcraft.air_bullet_ability.descri: Produce air projectile with power and speed comparable to bullets from revolver
item.lotmcraft.paper_figurine_substitute: Create Substitutes out of paper to take your place when damaged
item.lotmcraft.flaming_jump_ability.desc: Teleport into any fire, gaining fire resistance after doing so
item.lotmcraft.underwater_breathing_abil: Create a thin, invisible air pipe which allows you to breath underwater
item.lotmcraft.puppeteering_ability.desc: Manipulate Spirit Body Threads to turn anyone into your marionette and command them
ability.lotmcraft.puppeteering.entity_tu: Turned the entity into your marionette
Failed to turn the entity into your marionette
item.lotmcraft.marionette_controlling_ab: Gain more options for controlling you marionettes. Press shift to cycle through all your marionettes
item.lotmcraft.historical_void_summoning: Mark items or creatures to be able to summon them from Historic Void, they will disappear after some time, returning to Historic Void
ability.lotmcraft.historical_void_summon: You have already summoned the maximum number of items/entities!
Summoned item has returned to the void
Failed to summon entity: Unknown entity type!
Failed to spawn entity in world!
Summoned entity has returned to the void
Place items in your ender chest to mark them for summoning
item.lotmcraft.historical_void_hiding_ab: Hide in Historical Void being invisible, but unable to move, upon leaving it, you will be in exact same spot where you activated it
item.lotmcraft.midnight_poem_ability.des: Recite a poem related to night to either put them to sleep or attack
item.lotmcraft.nightmare_ability.descrip: Put your target to sleep and enter their dream, in this state you can reshape blocks, making your enemies suffocate in them, restrain your target, attack them or teleport in short distances. After ending nightmare any damage to blocks will be reverted
item.lotmcraft.requiem_ability.descripti: Put your targets Spirit Body in sleep
item.lotmcraft.spirit_commanding_ability: Command Spirits, making them obey to you
item.lotmcraft.night_domain_ability.desc: Unleash Darkness to an Area, damaging them and giving them various debuffs, like blindness, slowness, misfortune and darkness. You will also receive buffs
item.lotmcraft.hair_entanglement_ability: Bind your enemies with your hair
item.lotmcraft.horror_aura_ability.descr: Bring Fear into your enemies, unleashing your Horror Aura. They will be heavily debuffed and lose their sanity
item.lotmcraft.surge_of_darkness_ability: Flood the area with Darkness, bringing Horror and Death to everything around you
item.lotmcraft.mighty_blow_ability.descr: Strike your target with one single powerful blow
item.lotmcraft.instigation_ability.descr: Instigate two mobs to attack each other
item.lotmcraft.instigation_ability.not_v: You have to select a target mob first
item.lotmcraft.instigation_ability.canno: You cannot instigate a mob to attack itself
item.lotmcraft.shadow_concealment_abilit: Use shadows to conceal yourself from other people's eyes
item.lotmcraft.black_flame_ability.descr: Conjure Black Flames to burn your target, it is powerful and hard to extinguish
item.lotmcraft.frost_ability.description: Manipulate Ice to attack your targets, you can shoot with ice, condense it into spear or freeze whole area around you
item.lotmcraft.mirror_substitution_abili: Create Mirrors, taking damage will break one, teleporting you away and negating the damage
item.lotmcraft.thread_manipulation_abili: Manipulate thin and white threads to attack your enemies, you can shoot them, restrain your target or wrap yourself with it, gaining resistance against any damage
item.lotmcraft.charm_ability.description: Charm your enemy, it will slow them down and if it hits you, no damage will be dealt. You can't charm enemy twice
item.lotmcraft.disease_ability.descripti: Release deadly Disease that spreads in air, it will infect anything near you
item.lotmcraft.mirror_world_traversal_ab: Enter any glass to traverse between them. To exit it, you have to fly to any glass
item.lotmcraft.curse_ability.description: Curse your target to Death, to use it you have to hold target's blood in your offhand
ability.lotmcraft.curse.no_target: The owner of the blood could not be found
ability.lotmcraft.curse.no_blood: You need to have blood in your offhand
item.lotmcraft.petrification_ability.des: Petrify enemies and surrounding into stone, stunning them for a long time
item.lotmcraft.disaster_manifestation_ab: Trigger natural disasters on your enemies, summoning tornados, causing blizzard and drought, causing meteors to fall from sky
item.lotmcraft.structural_collapse_abili: Collapse any building, cave, mountain, ocean and any structure, burying everything
item.lotmcraft.apocalypse_ability.descri: Bring an End in area, dooming everything around you and transforming blocks into obsidian
item.lotmcraft.cleanse_ability.descripti: Cleanse yourself or others from negative effects
item.lotmcraft.plant_controlling_ability: Command Plants to attack your enemies or bind them
item.lotmcraft.poison_creation_ability.d: Create deadly poison and spread it in one area or pierce your enemies with it threads
item.lotmcraft.crossbreeding_ability.des: Create hybrid between two animals, choose first animal for its form and second for its attributes
ability.lotmcraft.crossbreeding.not_vali: The target is not a valid mob for crossbreeding
ability.lotmcraft.crossbreeding.not_same: You can't cross a mob with itself
item.lotmcraft.nature_spells_ability.des: Command Nature to aid you. Create large swamp area that traps your enemies, create a thick layer of wood on your skin to protect or unleash Nature's wrath onto your enemy
ability.lotmcraft.nature_spells.natures_: The target has already drawn the Wrath of Nature
item.lotmcraft.door_opening_ability.desc: Use on solid walls to pass through them
item.lotmcraft.spells_ability.descriptio: Various spells of Trickmaster. Shock your enemies, make a breeeze, stun them with light or freeze them
item.lotmcraft.recording_ability.descrip: Record an ability of beyonder for one time usage
item.lotmcraft.travelers_door_ability.de: Travel through Spirit World to reach your destination, or enter it by yourself
item.lotmcraft.space_concealment_ability: Separate a fixed space. Sneak while using to remove all concealed spaces. Use Collapse spaces to destroy anything inside and hurt entities.
item.lotmcraft.exile_ability.description: Banish your enemy to End, they will come back shortly after
item.lotmcraft.door_substitution_ability: Create a Door Substitute, next damage will be transferred to door, saving you from it
item.lotmcraft.wandering_ability.no_dime: Found no Dimension to travel to
item.lotmcraft.conceptualization_ability: Transform into collection of symbols, gaining ability to fly and massively increase your move speed
item.lotmcraft.sealing_ability.descripti: Seal your enemies. In this state they won't be able to move and use their abilities
item.lotmcraft.space_tearing_ability.des: Tear the space and make it become swallowed by the void
item.lotmcraft.waypoint_ability.descript: Set Waypoints that you can then teleport to. Cycle through the waypoints by sneaking.
item.lotmcraft.black_hole_ability.descri: Bend and Shatter space, time and light to create a Black Hole
item.lotmcraft.replicating_ability.descr: Replicate Beyonder abilities for multiple usage
Create an area where enemies get randomly teleported around and find it hard to use their abilities
item.lotmcraft.area_miniaturization_abil: Bring an Area with you, miniaturizing it and saving it inside your inventory
Create a localized anomaly that pulls in everything.
Create a Pocket Dimension in other Dimension, no one can enter it, without your help
item.lotmcraft.excavated_area.descriptio: Area that was miniaturized with Area Miniaturization
Unleash power, that is enough to shatter Space and Time, turning everything in range into Void, that is deadly to everyone without Void Immunity
item.lotmcraft.spectating_ability.descri: Spectate the minds and thoughts of the people around you
item.lotmcraft.telepathy_ability.descrip: Read the minds of the people around you
item.lotmcraft.frenzy_ability.descriptio: Thrown your enemies mind into distress
item.lotmcraft.placate_ability.descripti: Placate someone to stop them from loosing control
item.lotmcraft.psychological_invisibilit: Make yourself invisibility to a person's mind
item.lotmcraft.battle_hypnosis_ability.d: Control your enemies to do abnormal actions for a short period of time
item.lotmcraft.dragon_scales_ability.des: Create dragon scales that cover your skin to protect you
Cause your enemies to fall asleep
item.lotmcraft.dream_traversal_ability.d: Travel to the a person asleep
item.lotmcraft.nightmare_spectator_abili: Cause your enemies to dream a nightmare, dealing damage
item.lotmcraft.psyche_storm_ability.desc: Create an area of effect that cause your enemies to loose control
item.lotmcraft.calamity_attraction_abili: Call upon a calamity to befall your enemies
item.lotmcraft.luck_release_ability.desc: Release all of your accumulated luck
item.lotmcraft.misfortune_gifting_abilit: Give to your enemies, a misfortune onto them
item.lotmcraft.blessing_ability.descript: Give a blessing gifted to your allies
item.lotmcraft.theft_ability.description: If used on Player, it will attempt to steal any item from his inventory. If used on Mob, it will give random drop related to them, like meat from animals or arrows from skeleton
item.lotmcraft.decryption_ability.descri: Gain insight into you enemies and what items they posses
item.lotmcraft.gift_ability.description: Gift the item in your offhand to your target. Some items may have different effects, like tnt or anvils
ability.lotmcraft.gift.no_item: You need to hold an item in your offhand to gift it
item.lotmcraft.ability_theft_ability.des: Steal an ability from your opponent making them unable to use it for a short time. This ability will grow stronger with your Sequence
ability.lotmcraft.ability_theft.not_beyo: The target is not a Beyonder
item.lotmcraft.mundane_conceptual_theft_: Steal mundane abilities from your target, like their sight, ability to walk, distance between you and the target or their health
item.lotmcraft.parasitation_ability.desc: Possess your target, you are invulnerable until it dies
ability.lotmcraft.parasitation.target_to: Target is too strong to parasitize
Control your Host, either Draining their health to Heal yourself or kill them
item.lotmcraft.avatar_creation_ability.d: Create an Avatar of yourself, it will be 1 sequence below you
item.lotmcraft.deceit_ability.descriptio: Deceive surrounding enemies for them to forget about you, or deceive the world to be invulnerable for a short time
item.lotmcraft.loophole_creation_ability: Create an Area, where enemies will be randomly teleported around and their abilities will be stolen
item.lotmcraft.fate_siphoning_ability.de: Siphon someone's Fate, anything that is going to harm you, will be transferred
Steal Concepts, Steal Day, making it Night, or Steal Night, making it Day. You can also steal an Area and save it in your inventory
item.lotmcraft.ability_not_implemented: Abilities for this Sequence are not yet implemented
item.lotmcraft.passive_theft_ability.des: You have a chance to steal items from mobs or players you hit
ability.lotmcraft.passive_luck.trip: Your enemy tripped and took damage
ability.lotmcraft.passive_luck.effect_re: You were cleansed of negative effects through Luck
item.lotmcraft.passive_luck_ability.desc: Gain Passive Luck that grows with your Sequence
item.lotmcraft.paper_dagger_ability.desc: Right click with paper to throw it as a dagger
item.lotmcraft.puppeteering_enhancements: Your range has increased massively and the time it takes was reduced greatly. Your marionettes can now use your abilities. The number of marionettes was increased
item.lotmcraft.blood_loss_ability.descri: Targets you hit have a chance to loose their blood when attacked. You can use the blood for curses or rituals.
item.lotmcraft.mirror_revival_ability.de: If there is glass near you, you will resurrect after death
item.lotmcraft.riptide_ability.descripti: Your Beyonder Abilities get stronger while you are in water
item.lotmcraft.hornacis_gray_mountain_go: Horn of a Gray Hornacis Mountain Goat
item.lotmcraft.true_root_of_mist_treant: True Root of a Mist Treant
item.lotmcraft.spirit_eater_stomach_pouc: Stomach Pouch of a Spirit Eater
item.lotmcraft.blue_shadow_falcon_feathe: Feathers of a Blue Shadow Falcon
item.lotmcraft.dragon_eyed_condor_eyebal: Eyeball of a Dragon Eyed Condor
item.lotmcraft.shadowless_demonic_wolf_h: Heart of a Shadowless Demonic Wolf
item.lotmcraft.thousand_faced_hunter_blo: Blood of a Thousand Faced Hunter
item.lotmcraft.dream_eating_raven_heart: Heart of a Dream Eating Raven
item.lotmcraft.black_hunting_spider_comp: Composite Eyes of a Black Hunting Spider
item.lotmcraft.goat_horned_blackfish_blo: Blood from a Goat Horned Blackfish
item.lotmcraft.illusory_chime_tree_fruit: Fruit from an Illusory Chime Tree
item.lotmcraft.rainbow_salamander_pituit: Pituitary Gland of a Rainbow Salamander
item.lotmcraft.tree_of_elders_fruit: Fruit of the Tree of Elders
item.lotmcraft.abyss_demonic_fish_blood: Blood of an Abyss Demonic Fish
item.lotmcraft.mist_watcher_crystal: Crystal left by a Mist Watcher
item.lotmcraft.whale_of_punishment_stoma: Stomach of a Whale of Punishment
item.lotmcraft.king_of_green_wings_eye: Eye of the King of Green Wings
